SEARCH
Package org.example.library.models

Class CD

java.lang.Object
org.example.library.models.CD
public class CD extends Object
Represents a CD item in the library system. This model is used in Sprint 5 to support borrowing, overdue detection, and fine calculation for multimedia items.

      Constructor used when loading or creating a CD.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique CD identifier
      title - Title of the CD
      artist - Artist name
      quantity - Number of copies available
      available - Whether the CD is available for borrowing
